name: biopology
overview:
Our mission is pretty clear: “Improving physical, mental, and emotional well-being through innovantive research and technology to achieve a higher quality of life. Helping people become happier and healthier”

Biopology (biopology.com), formed in 2008 is an online, on-demand biochemical blood analysis which correlates body functions and conditions, as well as glandular imbalances to determine appropriate nutritional and supplement program for medical professionals.

The company has designed a new and unique technique that involves the analysis of lab results and medical consultation on the results explaining the internal mechanisms of chemical imbalances.

The Biochemical Blood Analysis technique, the core component at Biopology, utilizes the blood and urine analysis of the results to calculate a personalized outcome and to link chemical or nutritional imbalances with organs and glands in order to pinpoint the cause. Biopology delivers a report that provides a detailed action plan with steps to balance nutrition through an evaluation of blood and urine tests.

This advanced procedure allows medical professionals to identify and address the root cause, rather than chasing symptoms. Biopologyâ€™s analysis typically includes an in-depth analysis of the balance and influence of one organ on another, what foods are best for each specific metabolic type, what nutritional food supplements would be beneficial in order to re-balance the bodyâ€™sâ€™ chemistry.
